name: Primary Teacher Assistant (English language in Montessori group)
description:
Primary Teacher Assistant (English language in Montessori group 3-6 yo)Fly High Kids Academy is looking for an English speaking Primary Teacher Assistant for our beautiful casa classroom (3-6).

Our seven-years-old Montessori school has grown organically offering a Young Children’s Community, a Children’s House and an Early Elementary.
As a team, we are deeply committed to fully implementing AMI Montessori education investing in training, materials and literature. We are looking for a teacher with a high level of integrity who is dedicated to fully implementing Montessori pedagogy. The ideal candidate must recognize the need for and is willing to continuously work on himself/herself to improve his/her practice. A collaborative team player attitude, ownership, openness will be a great cultural fit for our transformational team.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor degree or equivalent
  • Proficient written and oral English
  • Montessori teaching experience preferred

Conditions:

  • Working hours: 8:00-16:00 (Mn-Fr)
  • Walking distance to Metro Timiryazevskaya/Fonvizinskaya

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary commensurate with experience
  • Visa support
  • Medical/accidental insurance
  • Holiday leave included with a 12-month salary payment plan
  • Professional training and career development opportunities
